content: this legal text outlines the progress of a divorce case between mr x and mrs x the parties have requested a divorce by mutual consent and have made agreements and declarations regarding their marriage property regime nonemancipated children tangible and intangible movable property real estate division tenancy rights debts future assets and liabilities and renouncement of inheritance rights they have agreed to the terms and conditions outlined in the document and have waived certain rights and claims the text also covers arrangements regarding the children including joint parental authority decisionmaking residence contact details for emergencies right to take the children abroad distribution of residence and holidays sharing of costs and expenses joint bank account for childrens expenses division of tax benefits and maintenance obligation they have waived spousal maintenance chosen jurisdiction for future legal actions and agreed on conflict management and experts they can consult the agreements will take effect upon notification of the marriage certificate and the costs of the divorce proceedings will be shared between the spouses the notary has informed the parties about additional taxes and the calculation of registration tax the parties have declared the estimated value of the property and request the application of a reduced tax rate the general administration patrimonial documentation has released the obligation to register a deed the parties confirm their ability to enter into obligations mentioned in the document and the notary certifies the accuracy of the information provided the parties have reviewed the draft document and confirm that it represents their intentions the deed is then signed by all parties involved
